00036     public function __construct($sTitle = '', $sProtocol = '', $sServer = '', $iPort = 0,
00037                                 $sEmail = '', $bEmailOnError = false, $sFile = '', $bFileOnError = false) {
00038         $this->aTests = array();
00039         $this->setTitle($sTitle);
00040         $this->setProtocol($sProtocol);
00041         $this->setServer($sServer);
00042         $this->setPort($iPort);
00043         $this->setEmail($sEmail);
00044         $this->bEmailOnError = $bEmailOnError;

00054     public function addTest(TestItem $oTest) {
00055         $this->aTests[] = $oTest;
00056     }

00119     public function run() {
00120 
00121         // prepare logger
00122         TestLogger::flush();
00123         TestLogger::log('<br />');
00124         TestLogger::log('<h2>Module: ' . $this->sTitle . '</h2>');
00125         TestLogger::log('<span class="debug">[' . date('j M Y @ H:i') . '] ' .
00126                         '<b>' . Utils::getNoun(count($this->aTests), 'test', 'tests') . '</b> defined' .
00127                         (!empty($this->sEmail) ? ', report will be mailed to <i>' . $this->sEmail . '</i>' : '') .
00128                         (!empty($this->sFile) ? ', report will be appended to <i>' . $this->sFile . '</i>' : '') .
00129                         '</span>');
00130 
00131         // run the tests
00132         $bRunOk = true;
00133         foreach ($this->aTests as $oTest) {
00134             if (!$oTest->run($this->sProtocol, $this->sServer, $this->iPort)) {
00135                 $bRunOk = false;
00136             }
00137         }
00138         TestLogger::log('');
00139 
00140         // deliver report, if requested
00141         if (!empty($this->sEmail)) {
00142             if ((!$bRunOk && $this->bEmailOnError) || !$this->bEmailOnError) {
00143                 TestLogger::sendToMail($this->sEmail);
00144             }
00145         }
00146         if (!empty($this->sFile)) {
00147             if ((!$bRunOk && $this->bFileOnError) || !$this->bFileOnError) {
00148                 TestLogger::sendToFile($this->sFile);
00149             }
00150         }
00151 
00152     }
